meanings.definition: Oral sex performed on a male.
meanings.sent1: He was surprised when he heard people talking about blowjobs at school.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked to learn about blowjobs from her older sister.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about blowjobs in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: The idea of blowjobs being a common topic in movies is quite interesting.
meanings.sent5: The mention of blowjobs made the room awkward and silent.

meanings.definition: The act of performing oral sex on a male.
meanings.sent1: Blowjobs are a taboo subject in many cultures.
meanings.sent2: The couple engaged in blowjobs as part of their intimate activities.
meanings.sent3: The movie unexpectedly featured a scene about blowjobs, much to the audience's amusement.
meanings.sent4: In some societies, blowjobs are considered a symbol of power and dominance.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the art of giving blowjobs in a tasteful manner.
